__e: He did not understand that, for Madame, her art must always be more important than his life.
I said to him straight out, I said... I could understand him wanting someone else because... sex between us was so... nothing.
I understood that you didn't want to pay with objects but with what you yourself had been created from.
Yeah, right, it looks good, but didn't understand about the history.
I thought if she understood the kind of man Randy was and the danger she was in, she might...
And I believe he understood the difference between right and wrong when he opened fire on that bus.
He just, he didn't understand why I wasn't eager to fly again, or why I was away from home, doing... god knows what with god knows who like a fucking teenager.
Id only done it twice, but now I knew why men love sex so much.
You know, at first, I didn't understand why you didn't want to live with us, but now I get it.
And, eh... he seemed like the only person in the world who understood... what I was going through.
Id only done it twice, but now I knew why men love sex so much.
But I understood, Because dad was never there for mom... Or me.
Before that, I really didn't understand any of their work.
My parents would go to sleep at 8 o'clock at night.
Yeah, but the only problem was he didn't understand a word I was saying.
But your father understood the risk of setting a god among men.
So, I wasn't there every day when she came home and maybe I didn't know about every tiny detail of her life but she understood why and she wouldn't have wanted it any other way.
He understood the fact... that everybody had to share in the game, and that he was willing to be part of this... to sacrifice some of his own game for that... was the most important thing.
I mean, he told me I didn't understand, which is true, so he wanted to maybe talk to you about it.
I mean that I remember specifically how things were at home when you were just a baby and didn't know what was going on.
Hopefully he's the only person that understood what was going on, but... it drives me crazy.
